005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupMultiline;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathExpression;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.impl.DefaultKeyField;
012
013import java.util.regex.Pattern;
014
015import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
016import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
017
018/**
019 * Represents a component of a key used in a key-based index.
020 * <p>
021 * A key field is targeted at a Metaschema field or flag data object's value. An
022 * optional pattern can be used to extract a portion of the value for use in
023 * generating an index key.
024 */
025public interface IKeyField {
026  /**
027   * Construct a new key field based on the provided target. An optional pattern
028   * can be used to extract a portion of the resulting key value.
029   *
030   * @param target
031   *          a Metapath expression identifying the target of the key field
032   * @param pattern
033   *          an optional used to extract a portion of the resulting key value
034   * @param remarks
035   *          optional remarks describing the intent of the constraint
036   * @param source
037   *          the descriptor for the resource containing the constraint
038   * @return the new key field
039   */
040  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortMethodName")
041  @NonNull
042  static IKeyField of(
043      @NonNull String target,
044      @Nullable Pattern pattern,
045      @Nullable MarkupMultiline remarks,
046      @NonNull ISource source) {
047    return new DefaultKeyField(target, pattern, remarks, source);
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Get the Metapath expression that identifies the node item whose value will be
052   * used as the key value.
053   *
054   * @return the Metapath expression identifying the key value target
055   */
056  @NonNull
057  String getTarget();
058
059  /**
060   * Get the compiled Metapath expression for the {@link #getTarget()}.
061   *
062   * @return the compiled Metapath expression
063   */
064  @NonNull
065  MetapathExpression getTargetMetapath();
066
067  /**
068   * A pattern to use to retrieve the value. If non-{@code null}, the first
069   * capturing group is used to retrieve the value.
070   *
071   * @return a pattern to use to get the value or {@code null} if the full value
072   *         is to be used
073   */
074  @Nullable
075  Pattern getPattern();
076
077  /**
078   * Any remarks about the key field as markup text.
079   *
080   * @return markup text or {@code null} if no text is provided
081   */
082  @Nullable
083  MarkupMultiline getRemarks();
084}
